sentences.sContent: Each flowerbed is populated with those classic English garden decorations: little statues of gnomes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Each flowerbed is populated with those classic English garden decorations: little statues of gnomes.
sentences.sCn: 他们各自的花圃开的花布满了那些传统英式花园，这些花就是地精的塑像。

sentences.sContent: In one of our attacks the regiment ran into an almost insurmountable obstacle: enemy fire coming from an emplacement camouflaged as a flowerbed was mowing down the lines of our infantrymen.
sentences.sContent_eng: In one of our attacks the regiment ran into an almost insurmountable obstacle: enemy fire coming from an emplacement camouflaged as a flowerbed was mowing down the lines of our infantrymen.
sentences.sCn: 在一次进攻中我们团遇到了一个几乎无法逾越的障碍：敌人从伪装成花圃的掩体中向我军步兵射击打乱了其队形。

trans.tranOther: an area of ground, for example in a garden, in which flowers are grown
